mapper.select: SELECT F.ACCT_ID, T.ID, T.TRANS_FLOW_ID, T.TRANS_CODE, T.STATUS, T.RTN_CARD_NO, T.PIN, T.UPDATE_DATETIME, T.BAL_STATUS FROM TRANS_RECORD_FLOW F LEFT JOIN CLEAR_JGKJ_REGISTER T ON F.ID = T.TRANS_FLOW_ID WHERE F.ID = #{transFlowId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT F.ACCT_ID, T.ID, T.TRANS_FLOW_ID, T.BUSINESS_TYPE, T.TRANS_CODE, T.CARD_NO, T.ORIGIN_JGKJ_SEQ, T.ORIGIN_JGKJ_DATE, T.CURR_CODE, T.ORIGIN_TRANS_AMT, T.REBACK_AMT, T.BRIEF, T.PIN_OPTION, T.PIN, T.SEND_DATETIME, T.WORK_DATE, T.SEND_DATE, T.SEND_TIME, T.STATUS, T.INST_DATE, T.INST_DATETIME, T.RTN_DATE, T.RTN_TIME, T.RTN_SEQ, T.RTN_CODE, T.RTN_INFO, T.RTN_CARD_NO, T.RTN_BALANCE, T.UPDATE_DATETIME, T.BAL_STATUS FROM TRANS_RECORD_FLOW F LEFT JOIN CLEAR_JGKJ_REBACK T ON F.ID = T.TRANS_FLOW_ID WHERE F.ID = #{transFlowId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT F.ACCT_ID, T.ID, T.TRANS_FLOW_ID, T.TRANS_CODE, T.STATUS, T.RTN_CARD_NO, T.UPDATE_DATETIME, T.BAL_STATUS FROM TRANS_RECORD_FLOW F LEFT JOIN CLEAR_JGKJ_MODIFY T ON F.ID = T.TRANS_FLOW_ID WHERE F.ID = #{transFlowId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT F.ACCT_ID, T.ID, T.CARD_NO, T.TRANS_FLOW_ID, T.TRANS_CODE, T.BUSINESS_TYPE, T.STATUS, T.SEND_TIME, T.SEND_DATE, T.WORK_DATE, T.INST_DATETIME, T.RTN_CARD_NO, T.RTN_INFO, T.RTN_SEQ, T.RTN_DATE, T.RTN_TIME, T.UPDATE_DATETIME, T.BAL_STATUS, T.BRIEF FROM TRANS_RECORD_FLOW F LEFT JOIN CLEAR_JGKJ_FREEZE T ON F.ID = T.TRANS_FLOW_ID WHERE F.ID = #{transFlowId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT F.ACCT_ID, T.ID, T.TRANS_FLOW_ID, T.BUSINESS_TYPE, T.TRANS_CODE, T.CARD_NO, T.CURR_CODE, T.TRANS_AMT, T.ORDER_NO, T.ORDER_MEMO, T.PIN, T.SEND_DATETIME, T.WORK_DATE, T.SEND_DATE, T.SEND_TIME, T.STATUS, T.INST_DATE, T.INST_DATETIME, T.RTN_DATE, T.RTN_TIME, T.RTN_SEQ, T.RTN_CODE, T.RTN_INFO, T.RTN_CARD_NO, T.RTN_AMT, T.RTN_BALANCE, T.UPDATE_DATETIME, T.BAL_STATUS FROM TRANS_RECORD_FLOW F LEFT JOIN CLEAR_JGKJ_TRADE T ON F.ID = T.TRANS_FLOW_ID WHERE F.ID = #{transFlowId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT F.ACCT_ID, T.ID, T.TRANS_FLOW_ID, T.BUSINESS_TYPE, T.TRANS_CODE, T.CARD_NO, T.CURR_CODE, T.TRANS_AMT, T.TYPE, T.RECHARGE_MODE, T.CHANNEL, T.CHANNEL_MERCHANT, T.CHANNEL_SERIAL_SEQ, T.SEND_DATETIME, T.WORK_DATE, T.SEND_DATE, T.SEND_TIME, T.STATUS, T.INST_DATE, T.INST_DATETIME, T.RTN_DATE, T.RTN_TIME, T.RTN_SEQ, T.RTN_CODE, T.RTN_INFO, T.RTN_CARD_NO, T.RTN_AMT, T.RTN_BALANCE, T.UPDATE_DATETIME, T.BAL_STATUS FROM TRANS_RECORD_FLOW F LEFT JOIN CLEAR_JGKJ_RECHARGE T ON F.ID = T.TRANS_FLOW_ID WHERE F.ID = #{transFlowId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT F.ACCT_ID, T.ID, T.TRANS_FLOW_ID, T.BUSINESS_TYPE, T.TRANS_CODE, T.DEBIT_CARD_NO, T.CREDIT_CARD_NO, T.CURR_CODE, T.TRANS_AMT, T.PIN, T.SEND_DATETIME, T.WORK_DATE, T.SEND_DATE, T.SEND_TIME, T.STATUS, T.INST_DATE, T.INST_DATETIME, T.RTN_DATE, T.RTN_TIME, T.RTN_SEQ, T.RTN_CODE, T.RTN_INFO, T.RTN_CARD_NO, T.RTN_AMT, T.RTN_BALANCE, T.UPDATE_DATETIME, T.BAL_STATUS FROM TRANS_RECORD_FLOW F LEFT JOIN CLEAR_JGKJ_TRANSFER T ON F.ID = T.TRANS_FLOW_ID WHERE F.ID = #{transFlowId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
SELECT C.CARD_NO FROM ACCT_JGKJ_CARD C JOIN TRANS_RECORD_FLOW F ON C.CUST_ID = F.CUST_ID WHERE F.ID = #{transFlowId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
UPDATE CLEAR_JGKJ_TRADE T
T.WORK_DATE = #{workDate,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
T.STATUS = #{status,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
T.UPDATE_DATETIME = NOW()
WHERE T.TRANS_FLOW_ID = #{transFlowId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

UPDATE CLEAR_JGKJ_RECHARGE T
T.WORK_DATE = #{workDate,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
T.STATUS = #{status,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
T.UPDATE_DATETIME = NOW()
WHERE T.TRANS_FLOW_ID = #{transFlowId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

UPDATE CLEAR_JGKJ_REBACK T
T.WORK_DATE = #{workDate,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
T.STATUS = #{status,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
T.UPDATE_DATETIME = NOW()
WHERE T.TRANS_FLOW_ID = #{transFlowId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

UPDATE CLEAR_JGKJ_TRANSFER T
T.WORK_DATE = #{workDate,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
T.STATUS = #{status,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
T.UPDATE_DATETIME = NOW()
WHERE T.TRANS_FLOW_ID = #{transFlowId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

UPDATE CLEAR_JGKJ_FREEZE T
T.WORK_DATE = #{workDate,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
T.STATUS = #{status,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
T.UPDATE_DATETIME = NOW()
WHERE T.TRANS_FLOW_ID = #{transFlowId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
